content:
Your pooch pals are always welcome @ TSC , but we do charge a $50 deep cleaning fee . You’ll also get a cool bag of canine goodies including poop bags , a lint roller & chew toys that you can keep , and we’ ll stock your room with food / water bowls & a plush dog bed for use during your stay.

 (ty @monsieur_wilbur_the_frenchie, @littlecooperbear, Ruby Yeh Photography, @ sailordoodle)

 

 

Learn More
